text:
I study communication in University for 1 week now and I choose this for many reasons. At the begining, in high school, I wanted to be a journalist on TV like the journalist that you can see on TF1 because I think that is a really great job and I wanted to inform the population of waht happen on the planete and a part of me wanted travel so much in Paris or in Paris because I think it's very important that the population know exactly what happen and where and for me the job of journalist is a very beautiful job.
So this was, at first, the source of my inspiration to do this study in communication but now I change my mind. In fact, now I want to continue to inform the population but in a different way, on TV or in social network for exemple. I want to work in the communication but not every communication. Indeed, in high school I really loved history class with my history teacher who teachs to my class lot of amazing think on french history and world history. And now I want to share with people the cultur that we have in Paris because our history is very huge. So for that, I want to continue my study in cultural communication. For exemple, I want to inform people with cultural project about a museum, festival or a beautiful cultural city in Europe because our continent is very rich . But one day, maybe my mind will change again about my dream job but for now I really enjoy this study.
